Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 9), dh-autoreconf, gawk, libalut-dev, libexpat1-dev, libfftw3-dev, libfreetype6-dev, libgl1-mesa-dev, libglew-dev, libglu1-mesa-dev, libjpeg-dev, libogg-dev, libopenal-dev, libpng-dev, libsdl-net1.2-dev, libsdl1.2-dev, libvorbis-dev, libwxgtk3.0-dev, pkg-config
Package-List: scorched3d deb games optional arch=any scorched3d-data deb games optional arch=all
